mapper.select: SELECT common_code AS "commonCode", upper_common_code as "upperCommonCode", common_code_val AS "commonCodeVal", common_code_dscr as "commonCodeDscr", common_update_date as "commonUpdateDate", common_delete_yn as "commonDeleteYn", common_order as "commonOrder" from tb_common_code where upper_common_code =#{upperCommonCode}
SELECT common_code_val FROM tb_common_code WHERE upper_common_code=#{upperCommonCode} ORDER BY common_order
